name: Connexus Modern
description: This theme is for anyone who's ever looked at a connexus lesson and thought, when was the last time this style was updated? 2000?. Changes: -Lesson Overhaul -Material Colors -More modern UI -Pearson Textbooks overhaul -Better readability -Better utilization of screen space -More modern UI Notes: As of now, the light theme is not recommended due to color issues causing bad readability on test screens This theme only changes the lessons, if you want a better home screen experience, check out Connections Academy Edit by Murkle Q.
